citation.title: to be published

notes.text: Mikhail Mendelev notes that this potential "was especially developed to simulate the solid-liquid interface migration in the Al3Sm alloy. The Al part is not the same as in my previous potentials."
This file was provided by Mikhail Mendelev on March 12, 2021 and posted with his permission. Update 19 July 2021: The contact email in the file's header has been changed.
